colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (CES RJE RIN PO CHE'I GSANG SGRUB THUN MONG MA YIN PA LA BRTEN PA'I LAS TSOGS JI BZHIN 'GRUB PA RJE NYID KYIS BZHES PA'I DGA' LDAN BKA' RGYUD PA'I SNYAN BRGYUD THUN MONG MA YIN PA 'DI NI YONGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO RJE BLA MA'I BSTAN 'DZIN RMU LI MKHAN CHEN PAS RIN CHEN SA LE SPRAM SRANG DO DANG, BKRA SHIS LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS BKA'I BSKUL MA BYUNG BA DANG DU BLANGS NAS KHRI CHEN RGYA NAG PA SOGS DAM PA GONG MA'I PHYAG BZHES JI BZHIN DU LCANG SKYA RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG CHOS @015A *, ,LDAN GYIS MDZAD PA LA GZHI BYAS, ZHIB CHA'I PHYAG LEN MTHONG PA BRGYUD PA ZHAL SHES KYIS BRGYAN PA DANG BCAS CHAR 'BEBS DANG, SAD SRUNG SOGS LAS TSOGS GSUM SHIN TU GSAL BAR BKOD CING, LAS TSOGS GZHAN RNAMS GSANG SGRUB THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I TSIG RIS LTAR BKOD PA 'DI NI RGYAL BA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DANG, KHYAB BDAG DAM PA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE, KHRI CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG DGE 'DUN PHUN TSOGS, RNAL 'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUG DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO, RDO RJE 'CHANG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO SOGS DAM PA MANG PO'I ZHABS RDUL GTZUG TU BSTEN PA'I BKA' DRIN LAS MDO RGYUD KYI GZHUNG LUGS CHEN PO RNAMS DANG, MAN NGAG MANG DU THOS PA'I SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RIG PA 'DZIN PA NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN MING GZHAN ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED AA CHE THU NO MEN HAN NAM RGYUD SMAD MKHAN POR GRAGS PAS, RJE RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I GSER KHRIR 'GRO BA LA MNGON DU PHYOGS PA'I TSE 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG GI PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPAL 'BYOR DAR RGYAS SO,, ,,)
